questions.question: Impulse response is due to periodic excitation

explanations.a: Periodic excitations compensates for energy loss during oscillations
explanations.b: Impulse responce is obtained when the system is not excited repeatedly

questions.question: Impulse response is due to intial excitation with high magnitude acting for a short period of time

explanations.a: Impulse response is due to intial excitation with high magnitude acting for a short period of time

questions.question: Impulse excitation is given at time t=0

explanations.a: Impulse excitations is given when body is at rest to know arbitrary responses
Exposion is of high magnitude and acts for short period of time
explanations.c: Hammers are used to impart impulse excitations
explanations.d: All are the sources of impulse excitations

explanations.a: As impluse excitation happens as time t=0, dirac delta function is zero everywhere except at zero
explanations.b: It is called as sampling proprerty as multiplying with a certian fuction and integrating with respect to time gives the impulse response
explanations.c: These are how unit impulse is described
